title: Masked bandits steal valuable jewellery from store in Browns Plains, Queensland
description: A crew of masked bandits has stolen gold, silver and diamonds worth thousands of dollars from a jewellery store in Browns Plains, south of Brisbane. #robbery #bandit #thief #jewellery #heist

title: Major bushfires threaten Perth homes | 7NEWS
description: Major bushfires are burning across Perth, with emergency blazes threatening homes in Kenwick and Bullsbrook. The Kenwick fire has scorched almost 100 hectares, forcing evacuations and temporarily closing Perth Airport's main runway. Strong gusty winds up to 43 kilometres per hour and temperatures above 36 degrees have created extreme bushfire conditions, with over 100 firefighters battling the out-of-control blazes. title: Woman suffers burns in sauna explosion | 7NEWS
description: Katja Grossa suffered horrific burns to more than 50% of her body when her homemade underground sauna exploded due to a gas leak on her Albany property. The 41-year-old spent almost three weeks at Fiona Stanley Hospital undergoing surgery, skin grafts and spray-on skin treatments. Doctors emphasise that immediate first aid with cool running water can reduce required surgery by 50%. title: Man charged after police find armoury of guns and ammunition in Revesby storage unit
description: Police have seized guns, gel blasters, thousands of rounds of ammunition, ballistic vests, a flashbang grenade and a disturbing, lifelike mask from a storage unit at Revesby in Sydney's southwest. An alleged guns dealer has been charged over the armoury and refused bail. #revesby #sydney #police #nswpolice #armoury

title: NATO warns Russia could attack Europe within 5 years
description: NATO chief Mark Rutte has urged his European allies to bolster their defence spending, warning Russia could set its sights on Europe within 5 years. #nato #markrutte #europe #russia #defence

title: Trump announces 'gold card' that expedites visa applications for $1M
description: US President Donald Trump has announced a new visa programme, allowing people to pay $US1 million to speed up their application process. #visa #goldcard #donaldtrump #usa #trump

title: More than 30 killed in Myanmar airstrike
description: At least 31 people have been killed, and 70 injured after a military airstrike hit a hospital near Myanmar's border with Bangladesh. #myanmar #hospital #bangladesh #military #worldnews

title: Over 3000 patients stuck in hospital due to aged care bed shortage
description: Thousands of elderly patients have been left stranded in hospitals, despite being healthy, due to an ongoing aged care bed shortage. #agedcare #hospital #patient #elderly #bedshortage

title: 20 years since the Cronulla riots rocked Australia | 7NEWS
description: It's been 20 years since the Cronulla race riots rocked Australia. Thousands of people gathered in Sydney's south to "reclaim the beach" after text messages circulated urging "Aussies" to take revenge for a fight between lifesavers and a group of Middle Eastern men at North Cronulla Beach a week earlier. Crowds spilled into the streets, targeting anyone who looked "Middle Eastern". In total, 26 people were injured in the riots, with 104 people charged and 285 charges laid. title: 'Schoolyard stock market': When sports cards became a million dollar playground investment | 7NEWS
description: In the early 90s, sports card collecting in Australia exploded into a multi-million-dollar industry, driven by demand for rare sports cards and global icons like Michael Jordan. Limited-edition sets, holographic inserts, and high-value Jordan cards turned playground swaps into serious investment opportunities. As prices for NBA cards and AFL limited releases surged, sports organisations battled over lucrative licensing rights, cementing the era as a defining boom in the collectible card market. title: Ozempic and Mounjaro set to be added to PBS
description: Weight loss drugs including Ozempic and Mounjaro look set to become much cheaper, as the government confirms it's considering adding the medications to the Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme. #ozempic #mounjaro #weightloss #medication #health
